author: psmith
msg: Fix for test cases breaking under Maven AND Eclipse.
Turns out that a failing test works fine by itself but not in conjunction with the other tests
running because an Filter is left configured in the JUL system, DESPITE it's
One has to manually remove all the registered filters even if calling reset().  That's not much of a reset()
The fix makes sure that each unit test tears down the JUL configuration correctly before the next test case
